channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet, Inc. -- FortiClientWindows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet, Inc. -- FortiClientWindows

item.title: CVE-2017-7344|2024-08-05T15:56:36.460Z -- fortinet%2C%20inc. -- forticlientwindows
item.description: A privilege escalation in Fortinet FortiClient Windows 5.4.3 and earlier as well as 5.6.0 allows attacker to gain privilege via exploiting the Windows "security alert" dialog thereby popping up when the "VPN before logon" feature is enabled and an untrusted certificate chain.
